title: Heading to Hakuba
content:
Today was a travel day to Hakuba, preparing for snowboarding!

I took a Shinkansen to Nagano, then a bus to Hakuba. The BnB I was staying in was a little bit of a walk from the bus station, but definitely not a hard walk.

The owners of the BnB were lovely - very interested to hear about different cultures of the guests, where they are from, what they do for a living and all that. Really nice. The room was awesome too, with a nice sized sitting area, and a loft for sleeping which was very roomy for a loft!

Was pretty hungry, so went to the shopping / restaurant street nearby and found a bar to enjoy a drink at until the dinner menu started to grab some food.
